description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Stravinsky Shocks Paris.

hook.text: The premiere of The Rite of Spring in 1913 caused an actual riot in the audience.

buildup.text: Igor Stravinsky's ballet score used savage rhythms and dissonant chords unlike anything before.

discovery.text: The audience screamed so loudly that dancers couldn't hear the orchestra on opening night.
